      • getStatus

        public java.lang.String getStatus()
        Gets the status of the instance
        Returns:
        the instance status that contains one of the following values:
        • running
        • failed
        • stopped
        • partiallyFailed
        • partiallyRunning
        • starting
        • stopping
        • unknown
